mapper.select: select JSBH, JSMC, JSLX, JSZT, JSMS, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ, JSQZ, JLZT, KZZD1, KZZD2, KZZD3, KZZD4, KZZD5, KZZD6 from PF_ROLE where JSBH = #{jsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JLZT = '1'
